selected_quotes: At last! Preprint of our 50-dog fMRI study. FUNCTIONAL MRI IN AWAKE DOGS PREDICTS SUITABILITY FOR ASSISTANCE WORK
the magnet safe steps up the to scanner are super cute.

fMRI in awake dogs predicts assistance work suitability (!)

facebook.title: FUNCTIONAL MRI IN AWAKE DOGS PREDICTS SUITABILITY FOR ASSISTANCE WORK
facebook.summary:
fMRI in dogs. 
Yes, that's right. Real live, wake dogs, trained to lie still in the scanner. 

http://biorxiv.org/content/early/2016/10/12/080325

facebook.title: FUNCTIONAL MRI IN AWAKE DOGS PREDICTS SUITABILITY FOR ASSISTANCE WORK
facebook.summary:
dogs who were more aroused by the stranger signals, as measured by the amygdala activation, were less likely to
be placed as service dogs
